sentences.en: A blizzard was blasting great drifts of snow across the lake.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪夹着大团的积雪吹过湖面。

sentences.en: A man who went missing yesterday during a blizzard has been found alive and well.
sentences.cn: 昨天在暴风雪中失踪的一名男子已经被找到，人安然无恙。

sentences.en: Eleanor arrived in the midst of a blizzard.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺在暴风雪大作时到达。

sentences.en: He drew back the tent flap and strode out into the blizzard.
sentences.cn: 他拉开帐篷的门帘，大步走进暴风雪中。

sentences.en: In Chicago I ran into a blizzard in March.
sentences.cn: 在芝加哥,三月的天气,我竟碰上子大风雪.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the economic blizzard smote Germany in her turn.
sentences.cn: 这时, 经济风暴袭击到德国来了.

sentences.en: Mountaineering in a blizzard needs a lot of grit.
sentences.cn: 在暴风雪中登山需要极大的勇气和毅力.

sentences.en: Peter fought his way through a blizzard to save one of the chickens.
sentences.cn: 彼得为了救其中一只鸡在暴风雪中艰难前行。

sentences.en: Retailers were hit with a blizzard of new products and brands in all shapes, sizes and colours.
sentences.cn: 各种形色不一、大小各异的新产品和新品牌铺天盖地，让零售商们疲于应付。

sentences.en: The blizzard blotted out the sky and the land.
The blizzard forced them to delay their summit bid.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪迫使他们推迟登顶.

sentences.en: The blizzard struck while we were still on the mountain.
sentences.cn: 我们还在山上的时候暴风雪就袭来了.

sentences.en: We got stuck in a blizzard.
We got stuck in a howling blizzard.
sentences.cn: 我们被困在怒号的暴风雪中.

sentences.en: You'll have to stay here until the blizzard blows itself off.
sentences.cn: 你得等暴风雪停了再走.
